column3: Description
a snack-time adventure to bihar with tangy black chickpeas paired with crisp flattened rice flakes (chivda) and peanuts

a breakfast staple from the mountains of himachal, delightful lentil stuffed steamed buns served with zesty chilli-sesame (til ki chutney) and nutty flaxseed (teesi ki chutney) dips - also available in chicken
tapori's take on the classic uttar pradesh delight, creamy, roasted cauliflower with a whole roasted beetroot
crispy potato and banana blossom croquettes, the ultimate bengali party pleaser, served with mint chutney
a sindhi brunch masterpiece, it's a delightful medley of sweet, spicy & tangy lentils served with crisp flatbread, creamy yoghurt, coriander & date chutneys, our tribute to the sindhi community
an adventurous take on spicy andhra-style squid, paired with a tangy ginger and lentil relish (allam chutney), served with a shot of creamy buttermilk (chach)

column2: tawa-masala kaleji ice cream - new delhi & tamil nadu
column3: north meets south in this unconventional dish inspired by delhi weddings, spiced chicken liver ice cream served on a bed of crispy dosa crumble
a spicy hot and sour pork curry of portuguese origins from the recipe books of the anglo-indian families of kolkata, served with goan poee bread
goa on a plate - fresh hokkaido scallops cured in spices with a refreshing fennel & onion salad, served with sol kadi (kokum & coconut milk digestif)
a taste of mumbai's true tapori culture, spicy minced lamb or beef paired with the classic ladi pav - the city's signature bread
tapori's take on the amritsari classic, fried fish meets a mint chutney & mango salsa for a street food experience bursting with flavour
transport your senses to the state of tripura with this traditional salad of pork with timur (indian sichuan pepper), finely sliced onion, ginger & coriander
a taste of kashmir - succulent new zealand lamb ribs simmered in milk, ghee & spices, served with doon chetin (a walnut yoghurt dip & apple relish)
a traditional mixed vegetable dish from gujarat, delicately spiced & served with mini fenugreek & millet flatbread (methi bajra thepla)
a hearty rajasthani lentil & millet porridge, infused with onions, garlic & yoghurt. served with ghee & spiced papad crumbs
a taste of indore with this boiled & baked whole wheat bread, paired with zesty lentils & fiery garlic relish
a tamil nadu favourite, mildly spiced chicken & flaky flatbread, wrapped in a banana leaf bundle & served with an onion yoghurt - vegetarian option available
literally translating to 'sour fish', a home-style assamese fish curry served with a traditional fermented dry fish chutney & timur (indian sichuan pepper) spiced rice
experience flavours from the coast of karnataka with crab, mussels, clams & prawns simmered in a curry of freshly ground coconut & spices, served with thin rice crepes (neer dosa)
rustic, spicy chicken gravy, enriched with freshly ground spices & coconut, paired with steamed finger millet porridge
a soul satisfying gently spiced fish stew cooked with yoghurt, served with signature gobindobhog rice

column2: naga pork curry & singju - nagaland & manipur
column3: authentic taste of nagaland in a hearty pork curry cooked with fermented bamboo shoot & served with a manipuri vegetable salad & indian sichuan pepper-flavoured (timur) rice
spicy beef chilli fry from kerala, cooked with coconut & curry leaves, served with malabari parotta

traditional breakfast of the khasi tribe from meghalaya, rice cooked with pork & pork fat, seasoned with ginger, pepper and prized lakadong turmeric, served alongside a black sesame pork curry, our tribute to the people of bodoland
a rich, mildly spiced lobster curry inspired by the french-creole cuisine, finished with cashew & fresh coconut paste, served with buttered white rice, our tribute to the indo french community
can you guess the secret ingredient of this legendary dessert from the royal kitchens of awadh? this lost recipe or 'pudding with no name' is a true taste of history
our tribute to the traditional payasam, a celebration of the beautiful temples and gardens of idukki
a trip down memory lane to lonavala with this delightful tart filled with old-fashioned chocolate almond fudge served with a scoop of house-made vanilla ice cream

mumbai's irani cafes inspire tapori's bread & butter ice cream, a creamy homage to the timeless comfort food transformed into a frozen delight, served with cutting chai, our tribute to the parsi community
